query:
INSERT INTO alerts (briefingId, type, category, title, description, contactName, organization, actionRequired, completed) VALUES 
(90001, 'important', 'follow-up', 'Follow up with Stephanie Phillips - Kiwanis attendee list', 'You requested attendee names and emails after your Kiwanis presentation on Nov 12. Stephanie responded with the President\'s contact (Hugh Grist at Hugh@gristrealty.com). Follow up to get the full attendee list for relationship building and future engagement opportunities.', 'Stephanie Phillips', 'Raleigh Midtown Kiwanis Club', 'Send follow-up email requesting complete attendee list', 0),
(90001, 'strategic', 'partnership', 'NC Digital Opportunity Gathering - State Partnership Opportunity', 'Mark forwarded an invitation from Adrienne Clark (adrienne.clark@nc.gov) for a Digital Opportunity Gathering pre-meeting in December 2025. This NC state government initiative aligns perfectly with HTI\'s digital equity mission and could lead to significant state-level partnerships and funding opportunities.', 'Adrienne Clark', 'State of North Carolina', 'Review agenda PDF and confirm attendance with Mark', 0),
(90001, 'important', 'administrative', 'Insurance review in progress with Carter Helms', 'You sent Carter your insurance documentation on Nov 14 using AI-generated PDF. Carter acknowledged receipt and complimented the AI approach. He will shop for better rates across multiple carriers. Expect follow-up quotes within 1-2 weeks.', 'Carter Helms', 'High Street Insurance', 'Wait for quotes, review when received', 0)
